description: Welcome to Sundance in sought-after Rosemary Heights! This bright & updated 3 bed, 2 bath townhome offers 1,480 sq ft across 3 levels with a functional, open layout. This townhome feels like a detached home, with main floor entry & minimal stairs. The main floor features an open concept and spacious kitchen with S/S appli & a movable island. The kitchen seamlessly flows out to a covered balcony, perfect for BBQs & morning coffee. Upstairs a master big enough to fit a king bed & ensuite in addition to two generously sized bdrms. Downstairs a east-facing yard off the lower-level family roomâ€”great for a kids' playroom, office, or gym. Backyard is a great size, fully usable, & turfed. Includes a garage and carport. Close to schools, shops, and parks, and easy access to Hwy 99.
